channel.title: Tutorial Section Overhaul
channel.description:
As you may of noticed, the Rs2 tutorial section is down to 5 pages. I spent a few hours going through the section and locking required topics, etc. If you have noticed I may of missed one or two, if this is the case please feel free to push that report button.
I'm posting this asking that you try to keep that section clean.
